cause.description:
A severe disease that causes chronic pain in the joints, tendons, ligaments and muscles. There are many facets to this illness. It is diagnosed through the 18 trigger points on your body. This disease can wreck a life, family, career & a person's hopes & dreams.
Kellee-Marie has been suffering in silence from this disease for over 25 years. Please help to continue the circle of life before this disease suffocates yet another person's hopes & dreams.
Join Kellee on her musical tour to raise money for Fibromyalgia/Chronic Fatigue Syndrome..details coming soon on KELLEE SANGER FIBRO TOUR 2008-2009.
1. Fibromyalgia/CFS can make you disabled
cause.name: FIBROMYALGIA/CHRONIC FATIGUE SYNDROME & RELATED CIRCLES
